title: angular-auth-oidc-client
descriptions:
I worked in the angular-auth-oidc-client project removing a dependency, jsrsasign (289.3kB), replacing it with the standard browser API by reducing the library bundle in a major way.

With my contribution, the browser API window.Crypto was implemented for low-level cryptographic operations.

The implementation concerns the validation of Json Web Token (JWT) with different algorithms.
